title: This is Gibraltar
brief_description: A review of daily life in the British colony of Gibraltar, the unique peninsula which stands at the narrow entrance to the Mediterranean. Records interviews with citizens and officials from every walk of life. The Keeper of the Barbary Apes talks about his famous charges, and closing sequences record the Ceremony of the Keys and describe its historical significance.
